long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save to nightwalk is a convenient Chrome extension that allows you to save images found on the web directly to your nightwalk account with just a right-click. This tool makes it easy to save and organize images, making image reference management more efficient.
